name: Jomon Sugi
skill: Deals 1226/1506 DMG to further enemies; decreases targets' speed by 75%/92% for a limited time.
ability: Slowly restores HP over time and moderately reduces DMG taken.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the largest yakushima cedar in Japan, thought to be as much as 3,000 years old. However, her appearance changes only once every 1,000 years, and until recently she looked like a tottering old woman. But no one noticed when she changed this time, not even the spirit agent with whom she had a contract...

main: "Um, you know I've lived hundreds of times longer than you, right?"
skill: "I go back way further than any of you little saplings!"
limit_break: "I still plan to keep on growing, just you watch!"
